title: The best winter coats for men, for casual or formal occasions
text:
The onset of middle age doesn't mean giving up on dressing well, says our style columnist Adrian Clark. Here are his simple rules for staying stylish in midlife...

A great winter coat should be versatile enough to see you through (almost) any occasion. After all, it’s one of your big seasonal wardrobe investments so you should be entitled to get unlimited wear out of it.

The trick is to find one that is adaptable enough to not look like an afterthought in more formal situations (you don’t want to be the man who throws a parka over a tuxedo) yet casual enough to wear with a chunky roll-neck and jeans. It’s all in the construction and its choice of fabric.
